greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Smallest m in range 1..phi(n) such that 5^m == 1 mod n, or 0 if no such number exists.
program: (MAGMA) [0] cat [Modorder(5, n): n in [2..100]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Apr 01 2014
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_ and _Amarnath Murthy_, May 08 2002
